snippet: What’s the best way to find cheaper flights during the holidays? How far in advance should you buy tickets? Advice from the chief executive of CheapAir.com.
abstract: Travel Q&A with CheapAir.com chief executive Jeff Klee, who offers advice on budget travel during the holidays.
lead_paragraph: What’s the best way to find cheaper flights during the holidays? How far in advance should you buy tickets? Advice from the chief executive of CheapAir.com.

headline.seo: Strategies for Saving on Holiday Airfares
headline.main: Strategies for Saving on Holiday Airfares
headline.print_headline: On the Horizon For Holiday Airfares
